channel.title: Important please read
channel.description:
Now its come to my attention since Project Evolution, (Well atleast i think it was him, sorry if i wasnt bro) posted a topic on malicious compilers, which helped a heck of allot, thanks for the warning dude, but, he posted the codes which were malicous, and more than likely some gay noob is gonna start randomly posting compiler downloads, when clearly, everyone already has one, and why does he want to may i ask? To basically kill your computer,
Take this link as a prime exmaple.. http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,307689.0.html Yes he may of given a virus scan, but remember, this proves nothing.
I would show you the link to the post that he did, but apparantly i will just make it worse.
Now Evolution for the sake of moparscape, please, either remove those malicous codes, delete the thread, or be flamed back to new york and back. ;)
Thank you for paying attention to this thread.

item.title: Important please read
item.dc:creator: @benscape benscape
item.description:
@benscape wrote:

stormcutter:

It’s not really evolution’s fault. Anyone who would want to do something malicious would just go to google, type in malicious batch files, and then they would get the code.

Now i never actually said it was his fault, im just saying, this is gonna cause peoples computers being killed, so i asked him to delete those codes, and no, noobs wont have the patience to google something as you may of noticed on these forums :mad:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 28, 2008, 09:47:03 am[/size][hr][quote=“Rog3r, post:5, topic:233690”]Well now your making it worse by advertising the link on his codes…[/quote]

Ok i shall remove.
